alert.note: Alert for Northern Litchfield; Southern Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 4:16PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Litchfield County through 445 PM EDT... At 415 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Milford, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads. Locations impacted include... New Milford, New Preston, Woodbury Center, Woodbury, Bethlehem, Washington, Morris, Roxbury, Bridgewater, Warren, Bantam, Hotchkissville, Candlewood Trails, Pomeraug, Lower Merryall, Marble Dale, North Kent, Upper Merryall, Erickson Corner and Dempsey Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
